greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: A number triangle related to the central binomial coefficients.
comment: Row sums are A082590. Diagonal sums are A106189.
formula: Number triangle T(n, k)=2^k*binomial(2(n-k), n-k); Column k has g.f. (2x)^k/sqrt(1-4x).
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Sep 04 2005
